news.title: What we know about Trump's latest travel ban
news.summary: President Trump has signed a proclamation banning travel to the US from nationals of 12 countries.

news.title: Pregnant women warned against using weight-loss jabs
news.summary: Women also reminded that they should use the most effective contraception to avoid pregnancy while taking 'skinny jabs'.

news.title: Badenoch launches review into possible ECHR exit
news.summary: A review by the shadow attorney general will examine whether the UK should exit certain domestic and international agreements.

news.title: First trailer for Wicked sequel released
news.summary: Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande will return for the second half of The Wizard of Oz spin-off.

news.title: This armoured vehicle was used in Iraq - now it stands on the US-Mexico border
news.summary: The Trump administration has expanded military bases near the border in order to deploy troops to detain migrants.

news.title: The Papers: Winter fuel 'U-turn' and immigration 'battle lines'
news.summary: The government has reversed its winter fuel payments policy and there is discussion of Keir Starmer's immigration policy.

news.title: Retiring police dogs 'deserve to get pension'
news.summary: Owners argue police forces should pay a contribution towards their former dogs' vet bills.

news.title: Trump orders inquiry into Biden's actions, alleging 'cognitive decline'
news.summary: Donald Trump accuses the former president's aides of covering up his "mental state" - a claim Biden says is "ridiculous".

news.title: US-Boeing crashes deal 'repugnant', says lawyer for victims' families
news.summary: The plane maker has agreed to pay $1.1bn to avoid prosecution over two fatal crashes that killed 346 people.

news.title: First bacteria we ever meet can keep us out of hospital
news.summary: For the first time, scientists show how our microbiome forms affects the risk of infection.
